select L.* from labels L inner join project_label PL on L.id=PL.labelId where PL.projectId=#[variable:params]
select st.* from steps st inner join test_case_step tc_s on st.id= tc_s.stepId where tc_s.testId=#[variable:params]

order by TC.order
